This is a sample text file for testing file validation.
It contains multiple lines to ensure proper text extraction.
This file should pass all validation checks as it's a valid text file.

Content includes:
- Plain text content
- Multiple paragraphs
- Standard UTF-8 encoding

This file is used to test:
- Text file validation
- MIME type detection (text/plain)
- File size validation (small file)
- Successful upload scenarios
